properties.entry: { datas: [ { id: "1", serverId: "sendToJgpt", tag: "sendRtdDatas", type: "triggerSyncToRest", name: "发送实时数据到监管平台", start: "1", schedule: "0 */2 * * * ?", jarPath: "/tmp/SyncHydro.jar", jobClassName: "kde.jobcontainer.job.synchydro.HYITSTriRecSyncGDJob", jobConfig: { sourceDbConfig: { url: "jdbc:mysql://172.16.11.53:3306/skgj_biz?serverTimezone=Asia/Shanghai&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF8&useSSL=false", driver: "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver", username:"root", userpwd:"Tepia@123" }, targetDbConfig: { url: "jdbc:jtds:sqlserver://192.168.140.210:1433;databaseName=HYDRO", driver: "net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver", username:"sa", userpwd:"scfb@2011" }, tblAndPks:{ ST_PPTN_R : "STCD,TM", ST_RSVR_R : "STCD,TM", ST_PICTURE_R : "STCD,TM", ST_SEEPAGEFLOW_R : "STCD,TM" }, recordTblName:"st_sendwait_e", mainQuery : " and stcd in( select distinct(stcd) from st_stbprp_b where addvcd like '44%' ) and tabid in('ST_PPTN_R','ST_PICTURE_R','ST_RSVR_R','ST_SEEPAGEFLOW_R') ", saveAndDeleteQry:" and slsh<:slsh and moditime<:moditime", delIntervalMins:720, delRowCount:1, delDaysAgo:0, rowsOnce:3, sendwaitQueryWhere:" and moditime>'2019-11-14 00:00' and moditime<'2019-11-14 10:00'", sendToUrl : 'http://202.98.201.103:8999/api/v1/datasync/dataRecive/reciveData' } } ] }
